animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐥 I'm a bird!
💦 I love playing in the water.
🔊 I say 'Quack!'

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and like to chase mice. I love to purr. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈‍⬛ I have soft fur.
🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.

animal.question: I go 'Woof!' and love to play fetch. I wag my tail when I'm happy. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🐾 I have four legs and a tail.
🏡 I live in a dog house.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I like to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.
🥜 I use my trunk to pick up food.
🐘 I am very big!

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I live in Africa and eat grass. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.
👕 My stripes help me hide.
🌿 I like to eat green grass.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. I like to make silly faces. Who am I?

hints.text: 🙊 I like to imitate what I see.
🌴 I live in the jungle.
🍌 My favorite food is yellow and curved.

animal.question: I roar loudly and am the king of the jungle. I have a big mane. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 Other animals fear me!
🐾 I am a type of cat.
🦁 My roar can be heard from far away.

animal.question: I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. I love to eat lettuce. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can hide inside my shell.
🥬 I love to eat lettuce.
☀️ I love to bask in the sun.

animal.question: I slither on the ground and don't have any legs. I can be very long. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin.
🌿 I can be found in the jungle and desert.
👅 I have a forked tongue.

animal.question: I hop around and have long ears. I like to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🧺 Some people keep me as a pet.
🐰 I have a fluffy tail.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm often seen in winter.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🌨️ I'm made of frozen water.

weather.question: I'm yellow and hot, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I come out during the day.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm very bright.
🔥 I give off heat and light.

weather.question: I’m water that falls from the sky. Sometimes you need an umbrella when I appear. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I make puddles.
💧 I can help plants grow.
🌧️ I come from clouds.

weather.question: I blow hard, sometimes I move the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make kites fly.
🌬️ I'm air that moves.
🍁 I can blow leaves off the trees.

weather.question: I am grey and full of water. I bring rain or snow. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I float in the sky.
⛈️ I can make it dark outside during the day.
💦 I’m made of water drops.

weather.question: I’m a flash of light and a loud noise in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I often come with rain.
🌩️ I can be scary.
💥 I am a spark of electricity.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that spins. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an 'eye'.
🏠 I can cause a lot of damage.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I appear after the rain, with colors across the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have the colors of a prism.
☀️ You need both rain and sunshine to see me.
✨ Some people think there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am very, very cold and icy rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard pellets of ice.
⚾ I'm bigger than raindrops but smaller than some rocks.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.

weather.question: I am frozen dew that looks like a tiny, white forest. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I form when it's very cold and humid.
🌿 I look like tiny feathers or needles of ice.
🧊 I am a type of ice crystal.
